hero_desc: Bugisu High School ewa okusoma okw'omulembe okugoberera Kalenda y'Eggwanga ya Uganda. Enkola yaffe egatta omutindo ogw'okusoma ogw'omuggundu n'okusuubira okw'enjawulo eri abayizi.
curriculum_subtitle: Emizannyo n'eby'emisomo ebigatta abayizi bonna mu ngeri y'ekitongole ky'eggwanga.
o_level_desc: Emyaka gy'okusoma egisooka egikubiriza obusobozi bw'okusoma n'empisa.
a_level_desc: Okutegeka abayizi okugenda mu matendekero aga waggulu n'amasomo amakakafu.
